instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install lucide-react recharts clsx tailwind-merge sonner
SETUP: Ensure Tailwind config includes the custom colors (zinc, lime) and fonts.
CLEANUP: Remove default App.css centering (.App { text-align: center }).
COMPONENTS: Create reusable UI components (Button, Card, Badge) in src/components/ui using the specs above.
THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle.
DATA: Mock the betting data realistically. Use 'Green' for positive line movement, 'Red' for negative.
CHARTS: Use Recharts for Line Movement and Odds History. Style them minimally (hide grid lines, use thin strokes).
TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors.
Use 1px borders to define hierarchy, not shadows.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (Zinc-400 minimum for secondary text).
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numbers and data points.
Never center the entire app layout.
